item.title: The footway has not been swept at all, 27th December
item.description:
From Bowness Road to Haslemere Road both sides including the enclosed footbridge, has not been swept for what looks like a year or more and looks a complete mess. Can this be swept properly as that section of the road looks completely unkempt.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 92, Long Lane, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trip hazard on pavement, 27th December
item.description:
On west pavement outside 119 & 121 Alleyn Park: stump of a signpost installed by Southwark Council, which recently fell because of corrosion. The stump remaining is a moderate trip hazard: it needs to be removed, and the hole filled with tarmac.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alleyn Park, Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
